Aromatherapy
Aromatherapy is the use of essential oils derived from herbal materials such 
as flowers, leaves, seeds, and other parts of the plant. It is used by inhalation, or through the skin in bath, compresses and massage to a localised area or to the whole body to produce beneficial effects. It has been found to be helpful in 
promoting health and well-being as well as in reducing stress and anxiety. 
Yoga
Yoga is an ancient self-care practice. It is a holistic approach to healing and well-
being and a system that integrates healing with culture, diet, environment, and 
tradition. Yoga practices have shown to reduce signs of mental stress, both in 
normal persons
